//All Zeroes
00 00 00 00
BE 0
LE 0

//A single 1
00 00 00 01
BE 1
LE 16777216

01 00 00 00
BE 16777216
LE 1

10 00 00 00
BE 268435456
LE 16

00 00 00 10
BE 16
LE 268435456

00 01 00 00
BE 65536
LE 256

00 10 00 00
BE 1048576
LE 4096

00 00 10 00
BE 4096
LE 1048576

//random combos
a3 2f 81 77
BE -1557167753
LE  2004955043

f3 16 88 37
BE -216627145
LE  931665651

//Repeating Patterns
01 01 01 01
BE 16843009
LE 16843009

10 10 10 10
BE 269488144
LE 269488144

70 70 70 70
BE 1886417008
LE 1886417008

//Negative Numbers

f0 00 00 00
BE -268435456
LE 240

BE 15
LE 251658240

ff ff ff ff
BE -1
LE -1

88 88 88 88
BE -120
LE -2004318072

BE -2147483648
LE 128

LE -2147483648
